node.title: Man dragged from vehicle and beaten on Waikato Expressway
node.description: A man has been critically injured after he was pulled from a vehicle and assaulted on the Waikato Expressway this afternoon.
node.content:
["A man has been critically injured after he was pulled from a vehicle and assaulted on the Waikato Expressway this afternoon.", "", "
File photo Photo: Supplied / NZTA
", "Police say a section of the expressway remains closed while a scene examination is completed. Diversions are now in place.", "At about 4.45pm police received multiple reports of an altercation at the expressway south of Rangiriri, involving a number of people and vehicles, including "a significant number of motorcycles".", "Police said initial indications suggested that a man had been pulled from a vehicle and assaulted.", "He was taken to hospital with critical injuries.", "Police have asked for anyone who witnessed this incident or anyone who might have dashcam footage to contact them."]
